description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1rp23","text":"Here, we describe a protocol for automated extraction of genomic DNA (gDNA) from yeast liquid culture and colonies. The protocol uses a Hamilton NGS-STAR automated liquid handler equipped with thermal-regulated microplate shakers. We have tested this automated protocol with 1.5 mL aliquots of liquid culture (OD600= 1) to demonstrate that it can provide high-quality gDNA at high efficiency. The protocol can also be implemented with manual pipetting, and/or to extract gDNA from larger volumes of culture by proportionally increasing the volumes of reagents and using an appropriate magnet separation rack. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":312,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ctru","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"588ml","text":"\nThe last step in this version contains a supplemental video with extra context and tips, as part of the protocols.io Spotlight series, featuring conversations with protocol authors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":9}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1766F3A79F8E11EE8D750A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/automation-protocol-for-high-efficiency-and-high-q-c6ntzden?step=71"}}}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"aqbf","text":"Certain commercial equipment, instruments, or materials are identified to adequately specify experimental procedures. Such identification neither implies recommendation nor endorsement by the National Institute of Standards and Technology nor that the equipment, instruments, or materials identified are necessarily the best for the purpose.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

keywords: laboratory automation, synthetic biology, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae, DNA extraction

AM9625)     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bko0u","text":"•\tSDS, 20% (Quality Biological, cat. no. 351-066-101) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78eqf","text":"•\tEDTA, 0.5 mol/L, pH 8.0 (Ambion, cat. no.AM9262) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cska4","text":"•\tTRIS-HCl, 1 mol/L, pH 8.0 (Invitrogen, cat.no. 15568)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvv1c","text":"•\t1x TE Buffer, pH 8.0 (ThermoFisher Scientific, cat. no. 12090015) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mup1","text":"•\tPolyethylene glycol (PEG-8000, Sigma, cat. no. 89510) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqbgv","text":"•\tSodium Chloride, 5 mol/L (Invitrogen, cat.no. AM9760G) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8b6","text":"•\tZymolyase 20T (US Biological, Cas. No. 37340-57-1) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rqau","text":"•\t2-Mercaptoethanol (ThermoFisher Scientific, Cas. no. 60-24-2) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cip9s","text":"•\tRNase A/T1 Mix (ThermoFisher Scientific, cat. no. EN0551) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"baqtr","text":"•\tSpeed-Bead Magnetic Carboxylate Modified Particle (Cytiva, cat. no. 65152105050250)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es497","text":"•\tTWEEN-20 (Life technologies, cat. no. 003005) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3drr0","text":"•\tEthanol, 200 proof (100%) (Fisher Scientific, cat. # 2716TR) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p51b","text":"•\tNuclease-Free Water (ThermoFisher Scientific, cat. no. AM9938)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bikl","text":"•\tElution Buffer: 10 mmol/L TRIS-HCl, pH 8.0 (Invitrogen, cat.no. 15568)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3flev","text":"•\tOptional (for step 43): Proteinase K, recombinant, PCR grade, 20mg/mL, (ThermoFisher Scientific cat. no. EO0491)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pgrt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bqbv","text":" Additional labware: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dvkq","text":"•\tSpin Plate: 96-well deep-well plate (Eppendorf, cat. no. 951033405)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gtuu","text":"•\tReaction Plate: 96-well midi plate (Abgene, AB-0765) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93icd","text":"•\tElution plate: Low-binding 96-well (Eppendorf, cat. no. 30603303) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a345e","text":"•\tUniversal Lid: (Agilent, cat. no. 202497-100)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvs43","text":"•\t12-Tube Magnetic Separation Rack (New England Biolabs, cat.no. S1509)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"853r3","text":"•\tAluminum Foil Lids (Beckman Coulter, cat. no. 538619)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b82c5","text":"•\tRubber Roller (Beckman Coulter, cat. no. 538619) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rmd6","text":"•\t50 mL Conical Tubes (FALCON, cat.no. 352098)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6990d","text":"•\tMicrocentrifuge Tubes, 1.7 mL, RNase/DNase free (Costar, cat. no. 3207/3620)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b173d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58o29","text":"Equipment: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0eso","text":"•\tAutomated liquid handler (Hamilton Robotics, NGS-STAR).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8031i","text":"•\tCentrifuge for 96-well plates.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Preparation of Zymolyase Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"52nfb","text":"Prepare stock of Zymolyase 20T by dissolving to a concentration of 1 U/µL in 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Zymolyase Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6fjdo","text":"Divide Zymolyase solution into 800 µL aliquots and store at -20 °C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of 2-Mercaptoethanol Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9pr91","text":"Prepare 0.001 % stock of 2-Mercaptoethanol by diluting 1000-fold into 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of 2-Mercaptoethanol Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3j207","text":"Store at 4 °C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Digestion Master Mix
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6a8ao","text":"Add 22.72 mL 1x PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Digestion Master Mix
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"54vrr","text":"Add one aliquot (800 µL) of Zymolyase Stock, 1 U/µL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Digestion Master Mix
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8me2f","text":"Add 160 µL 0.001 % 2-Mercaptoethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Digestion Master Mix
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"949bm","text":"Add 320 µL RNase A/T1 mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Digestion Master Mix
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fie5i","text":"Prepare fresh before each use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of 4x Lysate Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7aqvv","text":"Add 30 mL Nuclease-Free Water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of 4x Lysate Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8spq6","text":"Add 60 mL 20% SDS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of 4x Lysate Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4llvh","text":"Add 4 mL 0.5 mol/L EDTA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of 4x Lysate Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5e6rd","text":"Add 6 mL 1 mol/L TRIS-HCL, pH 8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of 4x Lysate Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9uovv","text":"Store at 4 °C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Beads Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"anpkf","text":"Vortex Speed-Bead Magnetic beads to resuspend","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Beads Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e4itt","text":"Divide Speed-Bead Magnetic beads into 1 mL aliquots, each in in a 1.7 mL Microcentrifuge Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Beads Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5r72t","text":"Place micro-centrifuge tubes containing magnetic beads solutions on a 12-Tube Magnetic Separation Rack until beads are drawn to the magnet and solutions are clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Beads Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aeqni","text":"Remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Beads Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"btb5d","text":"Add 1 mL 1x TE Buffer to each micro-centrifuge tube containing beads, remove from magnetic stand, and mix by vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Beads Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qdod","text":"Repeated steps 17-19 two additional times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Beads Stock
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5fb45","text":"Store bead stock in the dark at 4 °C. Bring bead stock to room temperature and mix well by vortexing before use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"85o50","text":"Add 9 g PEG-8000 to a new 50 mL Conical Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bijkq","text":"Add 10 mL 5 mol/L Sodium Chloride.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e467m","text":"Add 500 µL 1 mol/L Tris-HCl, pH8.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cle1c","text":"Add 500 µL 0.5 mol/L EDTA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ee8tp","text":"Fill Conical Tube to the 40 mL mark with Nuclease-Free Water, then vortex to mix every 1-2 minutes until PEG goes into solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a795n","text":"Add 27.5 µL Tween-20 and mix gently by inverting 4-6 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"85gg4","text":"Vortex Magnetic Beads Stock (from previous section) to mix thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fag7u","text":"Add Magnetic Bead Stock:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aqd4n","text":"For extraction of gDNA from liquid culture, add 3 mL Magnetic Beads Stock to the 50 mL Conical Tube containing the PEG/NaCl solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"17ef9","text":"For extraction of gDNA from yeast colonies, add 1 mL Magnetic Beads Stock to the 50 mL Conical Tube containing the PEG/NaCl solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a7mfb","text":"Fill Conical Tube to the 50 mL mark with Nuclease-Free Water, and gently mix until solution is a uniform brown color.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cco6e","text":"Wrap in foil (or place in dark container) and store at 4 °C, mix well by vortexing before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4s4g9","text":"Aliquot 1.5 mL (OD600=1) in 1-3 columns of 96-well Spin Plate using automated multichannel pipettes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5fci","text":"Centrifuge at 3700 g for 10 min at 10 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"etho5","text":"Remove supernatant from each well using automated liquid handler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5mu27","text":"Use modified labware definition or other constraints on automated pipetting to set a minimum distance of 2.5 mm between the bottom of each well and the tip of each pipette. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"rd9r","text":"The resulting volume of the remaining cell pellet and residual liquid should be approximately 50 µL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9q7l7","text":"Seal Spin Plate using Aluminum Foil Lid and Rubber Roller.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ev1ge","text":"Store at -20 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast liquid culture for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5jvk2","text":"Defrost at 4 °C for 30-60 minutes before continuing with extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast colonies for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b84ho","text":"Pick up colonies from agar plate and resuspend each in 50 μL of PBS in 1-3 columns of 96-well Spin Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation of yeast colonies for extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"34tjb","text":"Proceed with DNA extraction from resuspended colonies as described below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"au3lt","text":"Pipette 315 µL of Digestion Master Mix into each well containing a cell pellet or resuspended colony; mix 30 times by repeated aspiration and dispense.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aprc8","text":"Transfer 315 μL from each well containing resuspended cell sample to a well in a new Reaction Plate located on a thermal-regulated microplate shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"87g00","text":"Incubate at 37 °C for 25 minutes while shaking at 400 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c005g","text":"Pipette 100 µL of 4x Lysate Buffer to each well and mix 3 times by repeated aspiration and dispense.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dt3es","text":"Incubate at 75°C for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3qe5","text":"Move the Reaction Plate to a microplate shaker at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ml4","text":"Pipette 200 µL Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer into each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e2lda","text":"Mix Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer well by repeated aspiration and dispense before each transfer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7oaul","text":"After dispensing beads into each well, mix beads with cell lysate with one aspiration and dispense.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dove7","text":"During this step, the ratio of Magnetic Bead/PEG-NaCl Binding Buffer to the lysed sample volume is 0.48 (200 µL : 415 µL). Consequently, because of the relatively low PEG concentration in the mixture, only high molecular weight chromosomal DNA will bind to the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"28p7e","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 7 minutes while shaking at 300 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eb9h9","text":"Move the Reaction Plate to a 96-well magnet base to pull the magnetic beads out of suspension","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2echs","text":"Wait for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ac1h5","text":"Remove and discard supernatant from each sample (approximately 615 μL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6mpgb","text":"Add 600 µL 80 % Ethanol to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6h5vt","text":"Wait for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bl990","text":"Remove and discard the ethanol supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cebel","text":"Add 300 µL 80 % Ethanol to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qoed","text":"Wait for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eh1ds","text":"Remove and discard the ethanol supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4onrb","text":"After removing most of the supernatant with large-volume tips, use smaller-volume tips (e.g., 50 µL) to remove any residual supernatant from the bottom of each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"14j3v","text":"Allow magnetic bead pellets to dry for 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eg2da","text":"Move the Reaction Plate from magnet base to an automated thermal-regulated microplate shaker with temperature set to 60 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ffki1","text":"Add 100 µL Nuclease-Free Water to each well (note: can also use EB)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6fde0","text":"Resuspend beads by repeated aspiration and dispense (12 times).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a7hr6","text":"Incubate at 60 °C for 10 s while shaking at 1000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"89i6l","text":"Incubate at 60 °C for 7 minutes while shaking at 400 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3e7rg","text":"Move the Reaction Plate back to the magnet base.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"896t","text":"Wait for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7t6ks","text":"Transfer the supernatant from each well to a new, clean well in the same plate (still on the magnet base).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f5btl","text":"Wait for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"blok1","text":"Transfer the supernatant with extracted DNA from each well to a well in the Elution plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a7ef0","text":"Cover the Elution plate containing the extracted DNA samples with a Universal Lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7vkkb","text":"Optional (if protein contamination is problematic for down-stream application): Pipette 10 uL of Proteinase K solution to each well.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Yeast genomic DNA extraction. The following steps are implemented with an automated liquid handler, but can also be implemented with manual pipetting
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0o37","text":"Optional (if Proteinase K was added in step 43): Incubate at 50°C for 25\nminutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Spotlight video
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ftt7e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mi9p","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fl9m0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"embed","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"code":"\u003ciframe title=\"YouTube video player\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ibBVuWR6SD0?si=4W0SZrUmB4P961w_\" height=\"315\" width=\"560\"\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e"}}}}
